title: Football has been the big sporting winner in the New Year Honours List - 30 - Dec - 2023
body_text:
News | Rugby
14 Feb 2026 20:00
NZCity News
30 December 2023
She's appeared on the New Year Honours List for services to football governance following this year's World Cup across New Zealand and Australia.
The tournament saw the attendance record for a football game in Aotearoa snapped three times - with the top mark of 43,217 in the stands for the semi-final between Spain and Sweden at Eden Park.
Bareman says there's plenty of events to keep an eye on next year, including under-17 and under-20 World Cups.
